title: Cannot connect to any games that has been started.
body: Whenever i join a lobby and go to champ select, i end up not being able to connect to the game after the champ select is finished, this resulted in me losing lp and getting the afk warning thing.

replies.body: It's still not working. and I did everything.

Hey sorry to hear about this.  :(  I don't want you losing anymore LP so you should stick to custom games for now.  This issue can happen if your network goes dormant, failing to transition you over to the game server after champ select.  Run through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.
